CustomField.description: For Synchronous Video Telehealth visits into the Home, ATLAS location, or non-VA location, if the patient does not provide their location or emergency contact information, the healthcare professional must document that conversation in the medical record (e.g., The patient refused to provide their location and emergency contact information and was informed about the increased risk of not receiving timely support should an emergency occur. The telehealth health care professional and patient agreed to continue with the visit).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Synchronous Video Telehealth visits into the Home, ATLAS location, or non-VA location, if the patient does not provide their location or emergency contact information, you must document that conversation in the medical record. Once the risk of delayed emergency support is stated, you and your patient agreed to continue with the visit.
CustomField.label: Patient Declined Location ID
